description: Validate the implementation of thread-safe delegates in the AI loop by running the generated tests.
instructions: Navigate to the root directory of the AIWhisperer project.
Ensure your Python environment is set up and dependencies are installed (e.g., by activating a virtual environment and running `pip install -r requirements.txt`).
Execute the test suite specifically for AI loop delegates using a test runner like pytest. The command should target the specified test file: `pytest tests/ai_loop/test_delegates.py`.
Observe the output of the test run to confirm that all tests within `tests/ai_loop/test_delegates.py` are executed.
Verify that the test results indicate that all executed tests have passed without errors or failures.
constraints: The tests must be run in an environment where the AIWhisperer project dependencies are installed.
The test runner (pytest) must be available in the environment's PATH or executed via a virtual environment.
validation_criteria: The command `pytest tests/ai_loop/test_delegates.py` is successfully executed.
The output of the test run explicitly states that all tests in `tests/ai_loop/test_delegates.py` were collected and run.
The final summary of the test run shows 0 failures and 0 errors for the executed tests in `tests/ai_loop/test_delegates.py`.
name: validate_ai_loop_delegates
